floatTag.comment: pi in single precision should be 3.141593

doubleTag.comment: pi in double precision should be 3.141592592636

particleTag.comment: pi as a particle type should be pi+

stringTag.comment: quote string should be 'pass the red quarks, please'

intTag.comment: magic number as integer should be 133557799

longTag.comment: magic number as long integer should be 133557799002244668
